titles.title: Recognizing and congratulating the city of Manassas, Virginia, on the 150th anniversary of its founding.
Recognizing and congratulating the city of Manassas, Virginia, on the 150th anniversary of its founding.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes and congratulates the city of Manassas, Virginia, on the 150th anniversary of its founding.
